data.conditions: 6 AMPop out of bed; you don't need extra beauty sleep. And besides, it's time to reap the large rewards from a tiny little touch-up, two inches deep. Freshly softened corduroy carpeting will guide you through a nicely refurbished alpine landscape. Continue your smooth cruise or dip off-piste into the mad world of micro-powder pockets. Dramatic skies will feature bright solar beams breaking through a perforated cloud cover. Comfortable high temperatures will top out near 20 at the summit while Teton Village makes its way toward the 30-degree mark. A refreshing west-northwest breeze will blow in the 5 to 15 mph neighborhood. When it comes to societal productivity, skiing probably isn't the best activity. But it's by far the greatest way to escape from toxic cultural captivity. -Lege

forecast.day_comments: Rain likely, possibly mixed with snow.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. South wind around 8 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 70%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Rain and snow, mainly before 11pm.  Low around 34. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
